snippet.title: Among The Stones - Dare to be digital 2016
snippet.description:
Among the Stones follows a young adventurer discovering the secrets of a mysterious island with the help of the living stone people. It is a 3D platformer with creative building mechanics.

The game started development as a student project at Abertay University in Scotland and is now taking part in the Dare To Be Digital 2016 competition.

Thank you for checking out the protoype! Please leave a like or comment if you enjoyed the trailer. :)

Follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/bluedoorgames
